feed.title: Invoicerr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoicerr: v1.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • üêõ fix: correct logoB64 property assignment in invoice and quote services by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/56
  • feat: send invoice with mail by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/62
  • fix: email label override phone by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/63
  • fix: get api dashboard is slow by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/64
  • üêõ fix: remove LoginRequired decorator from getQuotePdf method by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/68
  • feat: select date format by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/69

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/compare/v1.0.8...v1.0.9

entry.title: New release for Invoicerr: v1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ‚ú® feat: update email sending to use HTML format for signature emails by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/74
  • üêõ fix: update invoice and quote templates to use postalCode instead of zip by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/77
  • feat: add id vat in quotes invoices pdf by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/79

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/compare/v1.0.9...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Invoicerr: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: recurring invoices by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/84
  • üîß refactor: remove LoginRequired decorator from OTP generation and signing endpoints by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/87
  • fix: remove "viewed at" and "signed by" by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/88
  • feat: make vat id an optional field for company by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/97
  • fix: client description by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/98
  • fix: make client founded date optional by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/99
  • fix: make default vat at 0 by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/100
  • feat: create client from select if none exists by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/102
  • feat: add german translation by @winterrific in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/103
  • feat: receipts system by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/105

New Contributors

  • @winterrific made their first contribution in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0
